title: @Riot: I'd like to donate all my RP
body:
Please take my RP and give it to a worthy cause, such as;

* Rent a friend for Amumu
* Nerf Irelia
* Give Zz'rot portal charges
* Fold the paper turrets 8 times
* Teach Sona sign language

Thank you. Here you go.
https://i.gyazo.com/683de0eebd07d0935ee894095fd28b05.png

replies.body: you poor soul... I'd litterally freak out if I had 1rp left, i'd put in a support ticket
Rito plz, give me just enough RP to buy Mecha Zero Sion.
What happened to being an Arbiter?
This isn't the Player Behavior board, no Arbiters here, just foke.

*folk

ty

>*  Rent a friend for Amumu

DON'T FALL FOR IT!  He may look all sad and pathetic, But he's been sitting at #1 in win rates  for weeks now and no one has so much as bat an eye at him. IT'S ALL PART OF HIS PLAN!

To be fair, when was the last time _you_  got violated in your jg lv 2 by Amumu?

amumu doesn't violate other junglers

other junglers violate amumu

why do you think he cries all the time
wombo combo its just too good, last game as amumu, the enemy team surrendered after a lucky ult i had <3
You clearly have never seen this combined with vlad, galio, nunu, and fiddle ults. This is probably the strongest wombo in the game.
Nah, swap out Fiddle for Wukong so you can get some physical damage in there and yet another source of aoe CC.

Diana's E is one of the best knockups for yasuo in a gank, since she gets right on top of them with her ult and its basically free or forces a flash. and she can dive onto a carry later on and get a good E off on multiple people and yasuo ult will outright kill them after diana's damage. And ofc the infamous Malphite / (K)Alistar+ Yasuo combo if diana cant get the engage, malphite or the (K)Alistar will and yasuo and diana will cleanup fast.

Or drop malphite and put yasuo top with orianna or cho mid, that works too P: (Cho's silence is pretty nice)
Could you please donate .25 rp to the rework/vu Karma foundation?
Yes please <3

Send it the 2 orginizations I run
Give Shyvana a 1350+ Skin
or
Make Syndra great again

I think you should make Syndra great again by changing one of her abilities to create a wall.

Obviously, this would have a mana cost for the nearest opponent instead.

Trump {{champion:34}}  needs to be a thing now.

Tr-ivia has fallen. used passive 4th bankruptcy. has returned unphased and running for Summoner in her next act of business.

irelia needs a nerf wtf???? shes weak pre-6...she falls off late game, when her true damage stops scaling and everyone buys their items. and right now itemization isnt good for irelia, and with tank tops like malph, naut dominating she cant even shine...she has a distinct power spike, making her a very balanced champion.
all of this was a joke are u ok
HA B8 TAKEN....noob
http://imgur.com/gallery/n8umjWj
It's a meme. She used to be a huge target for nerfs to the point where people would say things like "Leblanc instakilling tanks? Better nerf Irelia!"
IT WAS JUST A PRANK BRO!
You should never pursue a career in comedy.

So Lee Sin walks into a bar.

-ba-dum tsss-

That is exactly like Bungie and the fusion rifles on Destiny.

"Players are complaining about a lack in content? Better nerf fusion rifles."
